description.ko: 자연과 기술이 빛과 코드의 단일하고 불멸인 정원으로 병합되는 미래에 대한 탐구입니다.
description.en: An exploration of a future where nature and technology merge into a single, immortal garden of light and code.

prompt: A macro shot of a digital cherry blossom tree with branches made of #89CFF0 translucent glass fibers and petals of #FFB6C1 fractal code blooming with soft light. Growing from a base of #4A0E4E oxidized copper microchips and #50C878 mossy circuitry. Nature reclaiming technology through binary-coded petals. 8k resolution, macro photography style, Octane Render. Intricate subsurface scattering on the glass foliage and a soft bokeh background emphasize the delicate intersection of organic life and silicon.
